items.sentence: Tom must\'ve forgotten what he promised to do for Mary.

We often do what we have to do, not what we want to do.
Why would Tom have any problem getting along with Mary?
French is the only foreign language I\'ve ever studied.
Tom died three weeks ago after being bitten by a cobra.
Tom wants to know why you\'re not working here anymore.
Tom wants to make sure that that doesn\'t happen again.
Tom was seen stealing apples from the neighbor\'s tree.
The problem is everybody\'s too afraid to speak to Tom.
